def: When a business gets bigger by selling more of its products

When you measure the value of a company by using its shares. Price of Shares x Number of Shares

The act of buying or selling a product using an electronic system like the internet

When a business unit costs of production fall as its output rises and the business expands
When the cost per unit increase as a business expands
